name: Vobi
headline: All-in-one project management software for construction SMBs in Latam
description:
Vobi is a project management platform for small construction businesses, like home remodeling companies, contractors, and architects.

We help them save up to 50% of their time spent on manual work, mainly on the procurement and estimation processes, so they have more time to focus on their core activities. Through Vobi, they can manage projects from start to finish, collaborate with their customers, plan, quote, and make purchases or payments to suppliers, all in one place. No more spreadsheets and papers!

founders.name: Ythalo Silva, Founder
founders.description: My family businesses boosted my entrepreneurial mindset from childhood. I founded my first business while still in college, failed and soon after, became partner and EIR at MAR Ventures, a Brazilian venture studio that co-founded startups such as Easy Carros, Remessa Online (acquired by Ebanx for over $200M), and Modiax. At MAR, I led operations at Easy Carros and founded Modiax, a crypto exchange that was acquired by Foxbit in 2019.

founders.name: Murillo Freitas, CTO & Co-Founder
founders.description: Specialist in software engineering by Unicamp with more than 10 years of experience. He started his entrepreneur journey in 2015 as an EIR and Partner at MAR Ventures, a marketplace and fintech Brazilian venture builder that co-founded companies such as Easy Carros, Finpass, Remessa Online (acquired by Ebanx), and Modiax (acquired by Foxbit). As one of the first three people on the tech team, Murillo built the early technology versions of all these companies.

founders.name: Guilherme Guerra, Founder
founders.description: Guilherme is a civil engineer who graduated from the Federal University of Espírito Santo and has over 12 years of experience in the construction market. As a technology enthusiast, he couldn't stand the lack of technology in the construction industry and decided to enter the technology market by working for startups like Modiax (acquired by Foxbit) and MAR Ventures (a Brazilian venture builder) to get experience and create Vobi, one of the fastest-growing construction startups in Brazil.

founders.name: Fábio Witt, Founder
founders.description: Fabio loves working with digital products and founded his first company, a software house, in 2011 and his first startup (Easy Carros) in 2014. In 2015, Fabio became a partner and EIR at MAR Ventures, a Brazilian marketplace and fintech venture builder, where he helped build companies like Remessa Online (acquired by Ebanx), Singu, Modiax (acquired by Foxbit), and Finpass. He also got a scholarship abroad through the Science without Borders program, where he studied at Stanford and CSU Chico.

generated_description:
**Vobi: Project Management Simplified for Construction SMBs in Latam**

Founded in 2021 and incubated in Y Combinator's W22 batch, Vobi is an innovative project management software designed specifically for small and medium-sized construction businesses in Latin America. Located in São Paulo, Brazil, the company currently boasts a dedicated team of 45 employees.

### Mission & Purpose
Vobi aims to eliminate time-consuming manual processes in construction management, primarily targeting procurement and estimation tasks. By utilizing the Vobi platform, construction contractors, architects, and home remodeling companies can save up to 50% of their time, allowing them to focus on what they do best—delivering exceptional construction projects.

### Comprehensive Features
Vobi is an all-in-one solution that enables users to manage projects from conception to completion. Its features include:
- **Project and Task Management**: Offering tools like project scheduling, task management, and financial oversight.
- **Estimation and Financial Planning**: Automated budgeting through templates and cataloged resources.
- **Client Interaction**: The platform includes a client portal designed for collaboration and transparency, enhancing customer experience significantly.
- **Mobile Accessibility**: With a mobile app, users can manage projects on the go.

### Key Offerings
Vobi tackles common challenges faced by construction businesses:
- **Paperwork Reduction**: Say goodbye to spreadsheets and piles of papers.
- **Automated Processes**: Streamline tasks such as purchasing and billing to improve workflow efficiency.
- **Integrated Financial Oversight**: Get real-time visibility on budgets and expenses to maintain financial health.

### Partnerships and Growth
Kicking off its journey with backing from Y Combinator was a strategic move that set Vobi on a strong path for growth. The company has a partner in Nan, allowing it to further expand its reach and functionality within the marketplace.

### Industry Position
As a SaaS product categorized under marketplace, B2B, and construction tags, Vobi directly caters to construction SMBs—an often underserved segment ripe for digitization. 

### Conclusion
Vobi stands out as a reliable partner for construction professionals looking to improve their operational efficiency, enhance client communication, and ultimately boost profitability. With a mission deeply embedded in simplifying project management and providing a tight-knit collaborative environment, Vobi is set to reshape the landscape for construction SMBs in Latin America.

For more information or to request an invitation, visit [Vobi's website](https://www.vobi.com.br).
